tool_description: Tracks and analyzes historical price changes, their timing, and performance outcomes to inform future pricing decisions.

product_id.description: Product identifier to track price history for

history_period_days.description: Number of days of history to analyze

error_messages: Product not found: The specified product_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid history period: history_period_days must be between 1 and 730 days.
Insufficient price history: Not enough historical price data for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide product_id to track its pricing history. Optionally set history_period_days to control the analysis timeframe.

tracking_timestamp.description: When the price history analysis was performed

price_changes.description: Chronological list of price changes with timestamps

change_frequencies.description: Frequency of price changes by time period

performance_correlation.description: Correlation between price changes and sales performance
